Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 15th overall pick, by California in 1979...
Injured on 9/5/1979 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for 2 weeks...
Injured on 9/7/1984 with a Bruised Foot, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1985, off Dave Downs (NYY)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/20/1985, off Larry Demery (CHW)...
Injured on 5/23/1985 with a Strained Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/19/1985 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 9 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1987, hitting .448 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
